caption.title: Annual observational and environmental noise estimates over time.
caption.p: The top and bottom panel show the annual observational noise estimates (red) and annual environmental noise estimates (blue) over time. The dark lines represent the mean estimates, the lighter envelope represents the 95% credible intervals. The environmental noise parameter fluctuates between âˆ’ 10 and + 15%. The observational noise term ranges between 5% and 18%.
